titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed sale to the Government of Bahrain of certain defense articles and services.
A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed sale to the Government of Bahrain of certain defense articles and services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This joint resolution prohibits the proposed sale of various defense articles and related support services to the government of Bahrain, as described in Transmittal No. 19-06 sent to Congress on May 6, 2019.
